settings.title: Interested in Love Wellness Rewards?
settings.text: Earn rewards every time you shop and engage with our community.

settings.question: How does the referral program work?
settings.answer: Share your link with friends and get discounts when they shop! For every friend you refer who places their first order through your referral link, they'll get $10 off an order of $25 or more (before shipping and taxes), and you'll get $10 worth of Love Wellness Reward points to apply on your next order or subscription order.

settings.question: How do I find and share my link?
settings.answer:
You can share your link from this page, or from your account page! First, log into your Love Wellness account here! If you don't have an account yet, you can create one here. Then, click the REFERRALS section of your account page. Follow the directions to share your referral link with your friends via email or text – that's it!
Please note:in the spirit of the program, self-referrals are not allowed; referred friends must be a first-time customer; restrictions apply, see Terms of Service here for details.

settings.question: How do I apply and use a referral discount?
settings.answer:
If you've been referred by a friend: Click their referral link to receive a unique discount code. Copy the discount code that pops up when the page loads. Then, apply that discount during checkout for your $10 discount.Please note: your order must total at least $25 before taxes and shipping. If you've referred a friend: Once they complete their first order, you'll get an email confirming your $10 reward has been added to your account, which you can check on by logging in here!
To use your referral reward: On your next order, you can apply your points in checkout via a drop down on the cart page. Or, to apply to an upcoming subscription order, just head to the MY REWARDS section of your account page.

Please note: we cannot retroactively apply referral discounts to previous orders.

settings.question: Can I use my referral discount with another discount/promo code?
settings.answer: Per our terms, only one discount is applicable per order so you will not be able to apply your referral discount with another discount code.

settings.text:
